subject: ATTENTION:SIR,
body:
ATTENTION:SIR,
THIS TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE RECEIVED INSTRUCTION WITH YOUR PAYMENT FILE FROM OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY TO TRANSFER YOUR INHERITANCE PAYMENT US$32,500,000.00 TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT IN BY MONDAY AS SOON AS ALL CHARGES IS DEDUCTED.
PLEASE RE-CONFIRM YOUR  BANK INFORMATION TO AVOID ANY MISTAKE DURING THE TRANSFER BY MONDAY. WE ARE GOING TO TRANSFER YOUR INHERITANCE PAYMENT OF US$32,500,000.00 TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT BY TOMORROW AND THE TRANSFER CONFIRMATION SLIPS WILL BE SENT TO YOU FOR YOUR EASY
CONFIRMATION.
AS A MATTER OF URGENCY YOU ARE ADVISED TO MAKE A PAYMENT OF US$52 BEEN  PAYMENT OF DEDUCTION FEE.
THE DEDUCTION FEE OF US$52 WILL ENABLE THIS  BANK TO OBTAIN AN AFFIDAVIT AND STAMP DUTIES FROM  HIGH COURT OF NIGERIA, WHICH WILL EMPOWER US TO DEDUCT ALL CHARGES AND PREPARE YOUR DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE THAT WILL SHOW THAT ALL CHARGES HAVE BEEN DEDUCTED AND YOU WILL NOT PAY ANY OTHER FEE.
YOU ARE ADVISED TO SEND THE DEDUCTION FEE OF US$52 TODAY THROUGH MONEY GRAM TRANSFER WITH THE NAME OF THE OFFICER IN CHARGE,  ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU ,LAGOS NIGERIA,
AS SOON AS WE RECEIVE THIS PAYMENT FROM YOU TODAY, WE WILL DEDUCT ALL CHARGES AND YOUR BALANCE WILL BE REMITTED TO YOUR ACCOUNT BY TOMORROW MORNING AND THE TRANSFER DETAILS WILL BE FORWARDED TO YOU FOR YOUR EASY CONFIRMATION WITH YOUR BANK.
HERE IS THE MONEY GRAM TRANSFER INFORMATION BELOW:
RECEIVER NAME: ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU .
ADDRESS: LAGOS NIGERIA
SENDERS NAME:
SENDERS ADDRESS:
AMOUNT: US$52
ACT ACCORDING TO THE INSTRUCTIONS, I AM WAITING FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE.
NOTE: MAKE SURE YOU CALL ME AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS E-MAIL+234-816-339-1717 TO DISCUSS WAY FORWARD.
REGARDS AND GOD BLESS YOU.
YOURS FAITHFULLY
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
TEL:+234-816-339-1717

subject: Re:   ATTENTION:SIR,
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear that there's a payment waiting for me! I'm just a little confused about some of the details, though.

Could you please clarify what this payment is for? I don't recall having any pending transactions or expecting any payments from Nigeria. Also, could you explain more about the deduction fee? Why do I need to pay it and how does it work?

I'm also curious about the process of obtaining an affidavit and stamp duties from the High Court of Nigeria. Could you provide more information on this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Nellie

subject: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR NELLIE,

I RECEIVED YOUR MAIL AND THE CONTENT IS WELL NOTED.

YES WE RECEIVED  FILES FROM THE OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY WITH INSTRUCTION
THAT WE SHOULD RELEASE INHERITANCE CONTRACT PAYMENT OF $32.5MILLION TO YOU
WITH OTHER CONTRACTORS THAT THEIR PAYMENT HAVE BEEN OVER DELAYED FOR THE
PAST ADMINISTRATIONS AND WHERE GIVEN STIPULATED TIME TO DO IT AS THIS NEW
GOVERNMENT AUTHORISED US.

WITH YOUR CONTRACT FILE WITH US AND THAT IS THE REASON WE HAVE TO NOTIFIED
YOU ON THIS NEW DEVELOPMENT AND THE BANK HAVE ALSO NOTIFIED OTHER BOTH
LOCAL AND FOREIGN BENEFICIARIES ON THIS LATEST DEVELOPMENT.

WE DO NOT WANT A SITUATION WERE THESE TRANSACTION BEGINS, DELAYS OR
OBSTACLES TO ARISE AND THAT IS THE REASON THE BANK BRING AN IDEA FOR
AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE TO BE OBTAIN FROM THE COURT,AS THIS
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE,IF OBTAINED SHALL EMPOWER THE BANK TO DEDUCT EVERY
EXPENSES THAT WILL ARISE DURING THE TRANSFER OF THIS FUND TO YOU WITHOUT
THE BANK DEMANDING ANY UPFRONT PAYMENT FROM YOU BUT ONLY DEDUCT ALL
EXPENSES FROM YOUR FUND WHILE THE REST BALANCE WILL BE TRANSFERRED INTO
YOUR ACCOUNT.

WITHOUT GETTING THIS AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE COURT OF
JUSTICE,THE BANK WILL NOT LAY THEIR HANDS TO YOUR PAYMENT FILE.
IF WILL CAN GET THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE ON YOUR BEHALF TODAY
THROUGH THE BANK ATTORTHONEY,WE SHALL COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY FOR YOUR
TRANSACTION WITHOUT ANY FURTHER DELAYS.
BEST REGARDS
REGARDS AND GOD BLESS YOU.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP

subject: Re: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite interesting to hear about this new development regarding the contract payment. I must say, it sounds like a very organized process.

I'm curious about this Affidavit Deduction you mentioned. Could you please explain more about what it is and how it works? Also, how does the bank plan to deduct all expenses from my fund?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nellie

subject: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR NELLIE,

WE RECEIVED YOUR MAIL AND THE CONTENT IS WELL NOTED.

IF THE BANK OBTAINED THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE FEDERAL
HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE THROUGH THE BANK ATTORNEY ON YOUR BEHALF,AS THE
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE IS BEING PRESENTED TO THE BANK,THE AFFIDAVIT
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE EMPOWERS THE BANK TO DEDUCT EVERY EXPENSES THAT MAY
ARISE DURING THE TRANSFER OF YOUR FUND.

THEREFORE YOU ARE ADVISE,TO SEND THE $50 PAYMENT FOR AN AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION
CERTIFICATE SO THAT THE BANK ATTORNEY SHALL PROCEED TO THE COURT
IMMEDIATELY TO GET THE CERTIFICATE,AFTER THAT IS BEING DONE,THE BANK WILL
FORWARD TO YOU THIS CERTIFICATE FOR YOUR RECORD KEEP,BEFORE THE BANK BEGINS
FOR YOUR PAYMENT.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP

subject: Re: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm glad to hear that the bank is taking care of all the necessary procedures.

Could you please explain a bit more about this Affidavit Deduction? I'm not very familiar with banking terms and would like to understand better what it means and how it affects my fund transfer.

Also, could you tell me more about the role of the bank attorney in this process? What exactly will they be doing at the court?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nellie

subject: KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR NELLIE,

WE RECEIVED YOUR MAIL AND RESPOND TO YOU AS FOLLOWS,

1)THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE IS VERY NECESSARY TO GET FROM THE
COURT AS IT WILL EMPOWER US AS A BANK TO HAVE ACCESS OF YOUR FUND AND
DEDUCT EVERY EXPENSES THAT WILL ARISE DURING THE TRANSFER OF YOUR FUND
PAYMENT AND THERE IS NO WAY WE CAN TAMPER YOUR FUND UNTIL WE CAN BE ABLE TO
GET THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE COURT.

2)WITHOUT GETTING THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE HIGH
COURT,THERE IS NO WAY THE BANK CAN TAMPER YOUR FUND OR REMOVE ANY $1 DOLLAR
FROM YOUR FUND AS THE CERTIFICATE WILL AUTHORISED THE BANK TO DEDUCT EVERY
EXPENSES THAT WILL OCCUR DURING THE TRANSFER OF YOUR FUND.

3)THE ROLE OF THE BANK ATTORNEY IS TO GET ANY NECESSARY DOCUMENTS THAT BANK
DEMAND IN ANY TRANSACTION MOST ESPECIALLY FROM THE GOVERNMENT,THE BANK
ATTORNEY IS THE ONE THAT WILL GO AND GET ANY DOCUMENTS DEMANDED BY THE BANK
AT THE COURT.


IF YOU CAN TODAY OR BY TOMORROW SEND THE $50 FEE FOR THE AFFIDAVIT
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE OUR BANK ATTORNEY CAN PROCEED AHEAD TO COURT AND GET
THE REQUIRE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE ON YOUR BEHALF,AFTER THAT IS
BEING DONE,THE BANK SHALL COMMENCE ON YOUR TRANSACTION IMMEDIATELY WITHOUT
ANY FURTHER DELAY.

HERE BELOW AGAIN IS THE INFORMATION  FOR YOU TO SEND THE $50 FEE BY MONEY
GRAM OR RIA:

Receivers Name:ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU
Country: LAGOS - NIGERIA
Amount Required: $50

LASTLY,AM HERE FOR YOU TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU RECEIVED THIS FUND AND I KNOW
THAT YOU WILL REWARD ME AFTER YOU HAVE RECEIVE YOUR $32.5MILLION.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP

subject: Re: KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, some of the legal jargon is a bit over my head. Could you perhaps simplify it for me? 

You mentioned an affidavit deduction from the court. What exactly does that mean? And why is it necessary for the bank to have access to my fund?

Also, you mentioned a fee for this affidavit deduction. How much would that be and how should I send it? 

I'm really looking forward to receiving my fund and rewarding you afterwards as you suggested.

Best wishes,
Nellie

subject: KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR NELLIE,

WE RECEIVED YOUR MAIL AND THE CONTENT IS WELL NOTED.THIS BANK HAS ATTORNEY
AND IS WORKING WITH THE BANK AND HE CANNOT MESS UP,IF ANY ATTORNEY HAVE
DISAPPOINTED YOU,OUR BANK ATTORNEY CANNOT MESS UP,I ASSURED YOU THIS AND
THE ATTORNEY IS WORKING WITH THE BANK INSTRUCTIONS. PLEASE FOLLOW MY
INSTRUCTIONS AS AM HERE FOR YOU.

WHY THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE IS NECESSARY, IT IS BECAUSE, IF ANY
EXPENSES ARISES IN THE PROCESS OF TRANSFERRING YOUR FUND,THIS AFFIDAVIT
DEDUCTION AS BEING OBTAINED BY THE BANK,IT WILL EMPOWER THIS BANK TO DEDUCT
ANY CHARGES THAT COMES OUT IN YOUR TRANSACTION AND THE REASON WHY THE BANK
WANT TO HAVE ACCESS TO YOUR FUND IS BECAUSE THE BANK DID NOT WANT TO ASK
YOU ANY UPFRONT PAYMENT IN THE PROCESS OF YOUR TRANSACTION PAYMENT.

THE FEE TO GET FOR YOU THE REQUIRE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE COST IS
ONLY $50 AND YOU ARE TO SEND IT THROUGH MONEY GRAM OR RIA WITH THE
FOLLOWING INFORMATION BELOW:


Receivers Name:ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU
Country: LAGOS - NIGERIA
Amount Required: $50

AS SOON AS YOU MAKE THE PAYMENT,KINDLY SEND ME THE INFORMATION SO THAT THE
BANK ATTORNEY WILL IMMEDIATELY PROCEED TO THE FEDERAL HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
TO GET THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE ON YOUR BEHALF,AFTER THAT IS

THE BANK COULD COMMENCE FOR YOUR $32.5MILLION TRANSACTION PAYMENT AS IT
WILL TAKE ONLY 3 WORKING DAYS FOR THE FUND TO ENTER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT.

PLEASE,REMEMBER TO REWARD ME MY EFFORTS BECAUSE AM HERE FOR YOU AND I
BELIEVE THIS TRANSACTION WILL BE SUCCESSFUL AND YOU WILL BE VERY HAPPY IN
DOING  BUSINESS WITH US.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP

subject: Re: KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your detailed response. I'm glad to hear that the bank has an attorney working on this matter. It's reassuring to know that there are professionals involved.

I understand the necessity of the Affidavit Deduction now, thanks to your explanation. It makes sense that any expenses arising in the process should be covered by this deduction.

However, I'm a bit confused about how to send the fee for the Affidavit Deduction. Could you please provide more details? What is Money Gram or RIA? How do they work?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "it will take only working days for the fund to enter into your account"? How many days exactly does this process usually take?

I appreciate your efforts and look forward to doing business with Keystone Bank Group.

Best wishes,
Nellie

body:

body:
